name: Unreal Runner (SwordfishSoftware)
description:
Unreal Runner

Run through the course and jump and dodge the objects. The further you make it the more score you will gain. Collect the power coins, these will be redeemable in a future update.

This game has been made in unreal engine 4 and is playable on pc and android devices

PC Controls - Left & Right Arrow Keys.    Spacebar - Jump.     Down Arrow for faster down movement.

Mouse Controls - Left Click and move mouse.  Left, Right, Up and Down for full movement.

Android Controls - Finger swipe gestures - Up Down Left and Right.

This is my first mobile project and features the main mechanics of a mobile game. The game is still in development so they may be bugs that will be fixed in future updates to the game. 

Credit to: Kevin Macleod (music) - Epic Games (Assets)
